item.description:
Mondays are my long day. I teach a nearly 3 hour class! So by the time dinner rolls around, I am ready to relax and have a meal that I don't cook. I'd like to share that meal with you!

We will meet at the Gateway Tavern in Wareham. I have heard great things about this place from Wareham locals and have read a good review on Yelp as well. It sounds like a nice place to chill on Monday night. Hopefully there will be snow and no sickness tonight!

I'm keeping this meetup on the small side for a relaxing evening. I will send out my cell phone number earlier that day (RSVP cut-off is 12pm) to Yes responders. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me near the entrance; most of you know me by now!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Dinner at the Gateway Tavern
